item.title: Spunescape client update
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:10, topic:16919”][quote author=ruler link=topic=25348.msg292272#msg292272 date=1160119911]
Also i was thinking about making a open source client. But mopar has informed be no orignal .jar’s exist for the rs version the private servers use.
[/quote]

Bah, it amazes me how these things get lost to the community. Am I the only data packrat left?
Anyway, do you still want an original #317 client? I think I archived the cache too.[/quote]

I would like to have it, I have all the originals back to ~340, but only the deobs before that

Read full topic

item.title: Spunescape client update
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

mmm im not looking to do a 317 client sorry the fact is its using cache 377 which really messed a bunch of stuff up plus i don’t see any foreseeable progress in the future for a 317 server just take a look at some of the recent tutorials you just have to wonder what is happening to the world which is why id much rather start fresh on the new engine and build it right.

item.title: Spunescape client update
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:16919”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=25348.msg286953#msg286953 date=1159927497]
im not sure what your asking?
[/quote]He wants you to help him with his private server client, I think ;O[/quote]
no i know 0 about the servers, is it the server which go ahead first or is it the clients?

Also i was thinking about making a open source client. But mopar has informed be no orignal .jar’s exist for the rs version the private servers use.

I was thinking about using pd’ refactorer which renamed everything in the client before the last engine update. It would make client very customizable.

Also i was thinking

  1. more hooks between the client and server
  2. web-front end to the server
  3. completely new client gui
  4. better server coding?

Read full topic

ah well in that case ruler if your talking about deob 317 which is what all the current servers use the answer is “no” i want to pull ahead and start fresh

if your talking about the new client then thats a possiblity yes sense you have alot more knowllege on how the new client works

item.title: Spunescape client update
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

i was playing around with the idea of the new rs private server so this the sprunescape loader redone with last weeks deob

[code]import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.io.;
import javax.swing.;
import java.net.*;
import java.math.BigInteger;

public class SpuneRace extends client implements ActionListener
{

public static String server = "";

public static void main(String args[])
{
	server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "Welcome to SpuneRace " + ver + "\r\n" + 
		"\r\n" +
		"Please note:\r\n" +
		"This client is intended for private use ONLY!\r\n" +
		"Connecting to runescape will probably get you banned.\r\n" +
		"\r\n" +
		"Enter server address:\r\n" +
		"", "localhost"); 
	if(server == null){
		System.exit(0);
	}
    new SpuneRace(args);
}

public String getParameter(String p){
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("worldid")){
		return "2";
	}
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("modewhat")){
		return "1";
	}
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("modewhere")){
		return "0";
	}
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("lowmem")){
		return "1";
	}
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("members")){
		return "1";
	}
	if(p.equalsIgnoreCase("lang")){
		return "english";
	}
	return "0";
}

private SpuneRace(String as[])
{
    try
    {
    
		logStream = new FileWriter("log.txt");
		pDebug("LOG START\r\n");

		if(!server.endsWith("runescape.com")){
			// Our very own RSA Keypair for private servers :O~~~
			Class49.aBigInteger1085 = (new BigInteger("6259303740527262883015923895570727397218781226085692550100785536440535768270843613514350956402286696436891699210001655233714746992165907709666947465760831"));	   
		}
		
		/*
		// Change the welcome text
		Class65.aClass50_1488 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("SpuneRace Private Server Client @or1@421", 255);
		// Change the text on the buttons
		Class61.aClass50_1419 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("About", 255);
		Class39.aClass50_938  = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("Login", 255);
		// Change the text of the new user box.
		Class40.aClass50_1558 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("About SpuneRace", 255);
		Class40.aClass50_1555 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("SpuneRace Private Server Client @or1@421", 255);
		Class7.aClass50_211   = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("Created for private server use @red@ONLY!", 255);
		Class3.aClass50_111   = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("Use on official RuneScape servers will result", 255);
		Class35.aClass50_853  = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("in your account being @red@BANNED PERMINANTLY!", 255);
		Class33.aClass50_837  = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("Created by defyboy@gmail.com)3", 255);

		// init the client
		// We set it so cache files are stored in .file_store_34/cache - %serverhost%
		// This allows each server to have its own modified cache :D
		//Class55.aClass31_1281 = Class62.aClass31_1425 = new Class31(true, this, InetAddress.getByName(server), 34, "cache - " + server, 12);
		super.init();
		
		*/
		//Class58.aClass20_1374 = Class34.aClass20_839 = 
	    System.out.print(InetAddress.getByName(server));
	    Class61_Sub8_Sub13.aClass2_2744 = Class14.aClass2_315 = new Class2(false, this, InetAddress.getByName(server), 34, "cache - " + server, 12);
		super.init();

	    
        JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
        frame = new JFrame("SpuneRace Client " + ver + " -/- " + server);
        frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
        frame.setResizable(false);
        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(3);

        JPanel jp = new JPanel();
        jp.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
        jp.add(this);
        jp.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));

        JMenuBar jmb = new JMenuBar();
        JMenu jm0 = new JMenu("File");
        JMenu jm1 = new JMenu("Help");
        JMenuItem jm00 = new JMenuItem("Exit");
        JMenuItem jm01 = new JMenuItem("About");

		jm00.addActionListener(this);
		jm0.add(jm00);
		jm01.addActionListener(this);
		jm1.add(jm01);
        jmb.add(jm0);
        jmb.add(jm1);

        frame.getContentPane().add(jmb, "North");
        frame.getContentPane().add(jp, "Center");
        frame.pack();
        frame.setVisible(true);
        
    }
    catch(Exception _ex)
    {
		_ex.printStackTrace();
		System.exit(3);
    }
}

public URL getDocumentBase()
{
    return getCodeBase();
}

public URL getCodeBase()
{
	try{
		return new URL("http://au1.runescape.com");
	}catch(Exception _ex){
		_ex.printStackTrace(); return null;
	}
}

public void method21(String string, int i) {
	System.out.println("error_game_" + string);
	JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame, 
		"A fatal Error has occurred, and SpuneRace cannot continue.\r\n\r\n" +
		"Reason: " + string + "\r\n\r\n" + 
		"Please check the server is online and try again\r\n\r\n" +
		"SpuneRace will now Exit.");
	System.exit(2);
}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent actionevent)
{
    String s = actionevent.getActionCommand();

	if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("about")) {
		JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame, "SpuneRace Client " + 422 + "\r\n\r\n" + 
			"For Private Server use ONLY\r\n\r\n" +
			"Created by defyboy@gmail.com");
	}
    if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("Exit")) {
		System.out.println("Exiting...");
		System.exit(-1);
	}
}

public static void pDebug(String s){
	try{
		logStream.write(s);
		logStream.flush();
	} catch (Exception _ex){
		_ex.printStackTrace();
	}
}

private static FileWriter logStream = null;

public JFrame frame;
public static int ver = 422;

}[/code]

Read full topic
